Title: Steps to Initiate an Advertising Collaboration
Content: When a PR approaches you for an advertising collaboration, there are several steps to follow. First, the PR will inquire about your rates. Then, you provide a quote and your available schedule for publishing the advertisement. After that, you wait for the PR to confirm whether the collaboration can proceed. Once confirmed, you will finalize the collaboration details and agree on a publication date. Next, you start creating the content, which involves deciding on the topic, drafting an outline, writing the script, and designing the video cover. Finally, you publish the note and handle the payment settlement. Each step requires clear communication and adherence to deadlines to ensure a smooth collaboration.

Title: Handling PR Inquiries and Setting Rates
Content: When a PR contacts you, they will typically ask for your rates and availability. It's important to provide clear and detailed information. You should specify your rates for different types of content, such as text and video, and indicate any additional fees, such as a percentage for platform fees. Additionally, you need to provide your availability, considering your current schedule and the time required to create the content. It's also crucial to discuss any specific requirements the PR might have, such as exclusivity periods or content alignment with your usual style. By providing comprehensive information upfront, you can streamline the negotiation process and set clear expectations for the collaboration.

Title: Creating and Publishing the Advertisement
Content: Once the collaboration is confirmed, you begin the content creation process. Start by deciding on the topic and drafting an outline. This outline should include the main points you want to cover and how you plan to integrate the product into your content. After the outline is approved, write a detailed script and design the video cover. Each step should be reviewed and approved by the PR to ensure it meets their requirements. Once the content is finalized, publish the note on the agreed date. Make sure to follow any specific instructions for tagging or categorizing the content to maximize its visibility. After publishing, handle the payment settlement as per the agreed terms.
